author: COMSOL
description: This model demonstrates how to use the Control Function feature to perform shape optimization on a rectangular horn for an improved on axis response. The results of the initial design are exported to a new component via a Filter dataset. Further, the off-axis spatial response is improved using the Free Shape Boundary and Transformation shape optimization features.
label: rectangular_horn_shape_optimization.mph
name: root
